Package uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.trees

Provides basic binary tree implementations that are used during indexing of documents.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BlockFieldDocumentTree A binary tree that is used when indexing with blocks and html information.
BlockFieldDocumentTreeNode Models the tree node used when building the direct index with block and field information.
BlockLexiconTree The binary tree used when constructing the lexicon with block information.
BlockLexiconTreeNode The tree node used when building a lexicon with block information.
BlockTree The binary tree used when creating the direct file with block information.
BlockTreeNode The binary tree node used by the BlockTree class.
ComparableDICOMFieldDocumentTree Class that forms the binary holding the comparable terms found in a document
ComparableDICOMFieldDocumentTreeNode This class implements the node of a comparable term in the document tree of comparable terms Used by the class ComparableDICOMFieldDocumentTree
ComparableLexiconTree This class represents the binary tree formed by the terms in the comparable lexicon.
DICOMFieldDocumentTree This class implements the binary tree containing the terms found in a document
DICOMFieldDocumentTreeNode This class represents a node in the DICOMFieldDocumentTree and contains the term.
DocumentTree This class represents the binary tree formed by the terms in a document.
FieldDocumentTree The binary tree used when we build the direct index with field information.
FieldDocumentTreeNode The tree node used by the class FieldDocumentTree, when building the direct file with field information.
LexiconTree This class represents the binary tree formed by the terms in the lexicon.
TagLexiconTree This class represents the binary tree formed by the tags in the lexicon.
TagTreeNode This class represents a node in the binary tree representing the tag lexicon.
TermTree This class represents the binary tree formed by a set of terms, such as the terms in a query.
TermTreeNode This class represents a node in the binary tree of a query.
TreeNode This class represents a node in the binary tree representing either the lexicon, or a document.
 

Package uk.ac.gla.terrier.structures.trees Description

Provides basic binary tree implementations that are used during indexing of documents.
